verses.verse: Many a time <WH7227> have they afflicted <WH6887> me from my youth <WH5271>, may Israel <WH3478> now say <WH559>:
Many a time <WH7227> have they afflicted <WH6887> me from my youth <WH5271>: yet they have not prevailed against me <WH3201>.
The plowers <WH2790> plowed <WH2790> upon my back <WH1354>: they made long <WH748> their furrows <WH4618>.
The Lord <WH3068> is righteous <WH6662>: he has cut asunder <WH7112> the cords <WH5688> of the wicked <WH7563>.
Let them all be confounded <WH954> and turned <WH5472> back <WH268> that hate <WH8130> Zion <WH6726>.
Let them be as the grass <WH2682> upon the housetops <WH1406>, which withers <WH3001> afore <WH6927> it grows up <WH8025>:
With which the mower <WH7114> fills <WH4390> not his hand <WH3709>; nor he that binds sheaves <WH6014> his bosom <WH2683>.
Neither do they which go by <WH5674> say <WH559>, The blessing <WH1293> of the Lord <WH3068> be upon you <WH1288>: we bless you in the name <WH8034> of the Lord <WH3068>.
